column3: Latest;Phnom Penh------ Municipal Police and Anti-Narcotics Department officers have raided a suspect drug dealing hotspot.------Between 40-60 suspects (*sources vary) were arrested
column4: as well as several motorbikes and other items.------The operation took place at “Phnom Penh Late Night Restaurant” at 10:30 pm on July 29
column8: all suspects are at the Anti-Narcotics Department
column9: the Phnom Penh Municipal Police Department. ------TDNews
